title: Requirements — agent-config-driven-selection-contract
five_acts: Act I — Config Contract: demonstrate explicit agents policy and fail-closed validation.
Act II — Validation Failure Modes: show missing/invalid agent config returns actionable errors.
Act III — Dispatch Enforcement: verify API/command paths reject disabled agents before dispatch.
Act IV — Guidance Quality: confirm non-blank guidance output and explicit blocking feedback.
Act V — TUI Policy Fidelity: validate selectable agents derive from enabled+available policy state.
